about.title: About - TerraCloud
about.description: Discover TerraCloud, your cloud partner based in Poitiers. AWS expertise, software architecture and DevOps to support your digital transformation.

hero.title: About TerraCloud
hero.description: Your cloud partner based in Poitiers to support your digital transformation with expertise and pragmatism.
hero.location: Based in Poitiers, operating throughout France

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: TerraCloud was born from the conviction that the cloud should be accessible to all companies, regardless of their size. Founded by Paul Santus, a passionate cloud architect, our mission is to support organizations in their digital transformation.

With over 15 years of experience in software architecture and cloud computing, we have developed recognized expertise in AWS and DevOps technologies. Our pragmatic approach allows us to deliver robust and scalable solutions.
Based in Poitiers, we operate throughout France to support startups, SMEs and large companies in their most ambitious cloud projects.

questions.question: In which regions do you operate?
questions.answer: Based in Poitiers, we operate throughout France. We offer on-site or remote interventions according to your needs and preferences.

questions.question: What is your response time?
questions.answer: We commit to respond to any request within 24 business hours. For emergencies, don't hesitate to call us directly.

questions.question: Do you offer free quotes?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a free initial consultation to assess your needs and propose an adapted solution.

devops.title: DevOps
devops.description: Implementation of CI/CD pipelines, deployment automation and development process optimization.
features: CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions, GitLab CI
Containerization with Docker and Amazon ECS
devops.pageDescription: DevOps services: CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code, containerization and monitoring. Automate your deployments with TerraCloud.

hero.title: DevOps & Automation
hero.description: Accelerate your deployments and improve the quality of your applications with our DevOps services. From CI/CD pipeline automation to containerization, we transform your development process.

servicesSection.title: Our DevOps Services
servicesSection.subtitle: A comprehensive approach to transform your development and deployment process

services.title: CI/CD Pipelines
services.description: Implementation of continuous integration and deployment pipelines with GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or Jenkins.

services.title: Infrastructure as Code
services.description: Infrastructure automation with Terraform and CloudFormation for versioned management.

services.title: Containerization
services.description: Migration to Docker and orchestration with Amazon ECS for optimal scalability.

services.title: Monitoring & Observability
services.description: Implementation of monitoring solutions with CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana for complete visibility.

benefitsSection.title: Why adopt DevOps?
benefitsSection.subtitle: DevOps transforms the way you develop, test and deploy your applications. Discover the concrete benefits for your organization.

steps.description: Team training and continuous optimization of implemented processes.

cta.title: Ready to transform your processes?
cta.description: Let's discuss your current situation and discover together how DevOps can accelerate your development and improve the quality of your applications.
